value:
I cannot bear to face Veronica now.
Not after all that's happened.

Long ago, under a sky not unlike
this one, a little girl and I shared
tea together...$k$pLittle Veronica was very cute then.

I had thought Prince Alfonse to be
naive, weak—an opponent unworthy
of me. I misjudged...

You know... The Curse Directive
marks you as our greatest threat.

I wonder...is there some world
where this rage does not burn in
my heart?$k$pA world in which Veronica and I
could have been...like true sisters.

A gift, from $Nf.
...No agenda.

What is power without
an objective...
I operate best from darkness...

We cannot always have what
we want... A truth I am growing
uncomfortably used to.

You freely choose to grant me
this power...and believe you will
not regret it later? Hm.

I am Letizia. Tell me...is Veronica
here as well?

When we were young, I often
noticed Veronica imitating me.
Even during our teatimes...$k$pShe was so young, but she did her
very best to make tea for me. Heh...
It was cute, pure and simple.$k$pBut that...all of it... That exists
only in the past. It is not a place
we can ever return to.$k$pThe things I've done...the hatred
I've built in my heart...those things
are a part of me now.$k$pEven so, I wish no further pain
on her. That much I can promise.
She has surely suffered enough.
ええ
A curse
きゃああっ！
Insolent fool...!
Curses upon you!
Time's up.
How precious.
For Veronica!
You will regret this...
Ehehe
I am Letizia, ninth in the Emblian Empire's line of succession.
Why, I nev— You, a peasant, dares touch me?!
I lead Embla's Order of Heroes. We specialize in curses—or did you know that already?
My wrath knows no bounds. Not even the malice in Lady Embla's heart runs as deep.
Can you even fathom the pain of losing everything that was promised to you?
Oh, Veronica... Sweet, little Veronica... We had such fun together back then, didn't we...
My hate, my rage, my thirst for vengeance... When we speak, it all fades away...
Naturally.
Despicable.
That's your plan?
